bashIde.globPattern.description: Glob pattern for finding and parsing shell script files in the workspace.

bashIde.highlightParsingErrors.description: Controls if parsing errors will be highlighted as problems.

bashIde.explainshellEndpoint.description: Configure explainshell server endpoint in order to get hover documentation on flags and options.

bashIde.shellcheckPath.description: Controls the executable used for ShellCheck linting information. An empty string will disable linting.

bashIde.shellcheckArguments.description: Additional ShellCheck arguments. Note that we already add the following arguments: --shell, --format, --external-sources.
